attributes.action: Cut MP expenses,and use this large amount of cash to help us tax payers live half decent lives
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
if they took a cut in there excesive expenses, us tax payers would probably be able to live resonable lives instead of working as many hours as possible just to make ends meet, in the budget all taxes could be reduced instead of increasing year after year.
business would survive if taxes were reduced, Britain would become Great Britain once again

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
